verses.text: \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w child|strong="H5288"\w*, \w then|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* loved \w him|strong="H7121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w my|strong="H3588"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* out \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w As|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w*: \w they|strong="H3651"\w* \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* \w unto|strong="H6999"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Baalim|strong="H1168"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w burned|strong="H6999"\w* \w incense|strong="H6999"\w* \w to|strong="H1980"\w* \w graven|strong="H6456"\w* \w images|strong="H6456"\w*.

\w Yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w taught|strong="H3045"\w* Ephraim \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w go|strong="H8637"\w*; \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3947"\w* \w arms|strong="H2220"\w*; \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w knew|strong="H3045"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w healed|strong="H7495"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w drew|strong="H4900"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w cords|strong="H5688"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* man, \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w bands|strong="H5688"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* love; \w and|strong="H4900"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w take|strong="H7311"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w jaws|strong="H3895"\w*, \w and|strong="H4900"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w laid|strong="H5186"\w* meat \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w into|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Assyrian \w shall|strong="H4428"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w refused|strong="H3985"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H3615"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w shall|strong="H5892"\w* \w fall|strong="H2342"\w* \w upon|strong="H2719"\w* \w his|strong="H3615"\w* \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* \w shall|strong="H5892"\w* \w consume|strong="H3615"\w* \w his|strong="H3615"\w* bars, \w and|strong="H5892"\w* devour \add them\add*, because \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w their|strong="H3615"\w* own \w counsels|strong="H4156"\w*.

\w And|strong="H5971"\w* \w my|strong="H7311"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w are|strong="H5971"\w* \w bent|strong="H8511"\w* \w to|strong="H7121"\w* \w backsliding|strong="H4878"\w* \w from|strong="H5971"\w* \w me|strong="H7121"\w*: though \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H7121"\w* \add him that is \add*\w on|strong="H7121"\w* \w high|strong="H7311"\w*, \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w at|strong="H3808"\w* \w all|strong="H3162"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w exalt|strong="H7311"\w* \add him\add*.

How \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w thee|strong="H5414"\w* \w up|strong="H5414"\w*, Ephraim? \add how \add*\w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* \w thee|strong="H5414"\w*, \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*? how \w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w make|strong="H7760"\w* \w thee|strong="H5414"\w* \w as|strong="H5414"\w* Admah? \add how \add*\w shall|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w thee|strong="H5414"\w* \w as|strong="H5414"\w* \w Zeboim|strong="H6636"\w*? \w mine|strong="H7760"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w is|strong="H3820"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w compassions|strong="H5150"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w kindled|strong="H3648"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w execute|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w fierceness|strong="H2740"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w mine|strong="H7725"\w* \w anger|strong="H2740"\w*, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* Ephraim: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* am \w God|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* man; \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w One|strong="H6918"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* \w of|strong="H5892"\w* \w thee|strong="H6213"\w*: \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5892"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* enter \w into|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w roar|strong="H7580"\w* \w like|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lion: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w roar|strong="H7580"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w trembling|strong="H2729"\w* \w from|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w west|strong="H3220"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H2729"\w* \w trembling|strong="H2729"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w bird|strong="H6833"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dove|strong="H3123"\w* \w out|strong="H5921"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* land \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Assyria: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w make|strong="H2729"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w houses|strong="H1004"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* \w the|strong="H5002"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.
Ephraim compasseth me about with falsehood, and the house of Israel with deceit: but Judah yet ruleth with God, and is faithful with the Holy One.
